title: Train service delayed due to track fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 轨道故障导致火车服务延迟
title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan kereta api tertunda kerana kerosakan trek
title_translations.ta: தடக் கோளாறு காரணமாக ரயில் சேவை தாமதமானது

updates.text: UPDATE:Train service from Tanah Merah to Changi Airport running well again.
Train service from Tanah Merah to Changi Airport delayed due to track fault.
